verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the captive <S%H7622><s%> ones of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> We were like those who dream. <S%H2492><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> our mouth <S%H6310><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with laughter, <S%H7814><s%> And our tongue <S%H3956><s%> with joyful <S%H7440><s%> shouting; <S%H7440><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> they said <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> things <S%H1431><s%> for them."
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> things <S%H1431><s%> for us; We are glad. <S%H8056><s%>
Restore <S%H7725><s%> our captivity, <S%H7622><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> As the streams <S%H650><s%> in the South. <S%H5045><s%>
Those who sow <S%H2232><s%> in tears <S%H1832><s%> shall reap <S%H7114><s%> with joyful <S%H7440><s%> shouting. <S%H7440><s%>

He who goes <S%H1980><s%> to and fro <S%H1980><s%> weeping, <S%H1058><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> [his] bag <S%H4901><s%> of seed, <S%H2233><s%> Shall indeed <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> again with a shout <S%H7440><s%> of joy, <S%H7440><s%> bringing <S%H5375><s%> his sheaves <S%H485><s%> [with him].
